definitions.definition: A topically organized book of reference on a certain field of knowledge, regardless of size, but archetypally one to be kept readily at hand .
A place where illicit bets can be placed.

main_definition: A topically organized book of reference on a certain field of knowledge, regardless of size, but archetypally one to be kept readily at hand .
secondary_definitions: ( US , gambling ) A place where illicit bets can be placed.
